channel.title: A working Flax picker * able to bank*
channel.description: I've encountered the same problem with many flax picking scripts iv'e tried. The all had problems finding the bank and/or banking the flax. Can somebody supply me with a Script of a flax picker that successfully banks the flax.

@mr_freeweed wrote:

I have a working flax picker but I have not solved the annoying beekeeper random

item.title: A working Flax picker * able to bank*
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Yeah I know what you mean Salad Man… (nice name :)) I hate buying bow strings cause they are so expensive and finding a buyer is sometimes hard too. Picking your own and spinning and then banking would be perfect.

Home’s old flax picker worked great, instead of using walking procedures why not just use random click coords on the minimap. The coords will always work until Jagex decides to make the minimap float or something lol. Oh wait… I forgot about the minimap being in differnt positions. Nvm, I’m wrong.

Read full topic
